Description: Democratizing AI with our easy-to-use platform. Build, deploy, and monetize your AI solutions with ease.
Full Description: We are democratizing the process of AI tool development by making it easier for anyone to build high-quality AI tools that can be distributed and monetized through our AI membership platform. We are solving the problems caused by the fragmented AI tools ecosystem, such as the difficulty of discovering the right tool, paying for tools, and ensuring safety and ease of use for users. There are hundreds of AI tools launched into the market each month, but there is no single platform to aggregate these tools, which can be confusing for users. We are building the world's largest AI membership platform, which we call the "Netflix of AI tools," to help users discover, access, and leverage the power of AI tools from a single platform and under a single membership. Our platform will provide a number of benefits for users, including: - Ease of discovery: Users will be able to easily find the right AI tool for their needs by searching by category, task, or keyword. - Convenient payment: Users will be able to pay for AI tools on a monthly or annual basis, and they will have access to all of the tools in the platform as part of their membership. - Safety and ease of use: Our platform will be secure and easy to use, and we will take steps to ensure that users' data is protected. - Wide selection of tools: Our platform will offer a wide selection of AI tools from a variety of developers, so users will be able to find the tools that are right for them. We believe that our platform will revolutionize the way that AI tools are developed, distributed, and monetized. We are excited to make AI tools more accessible to everyone and to help users get the most out of the power of AI.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Data and Analytics, Education, Science and Engineering, Software
Top 5 Investors: AngelList

Description: Most companies waste resources to collect and manage their receivables. Bilendo helps to secure these resources and to make good decisions.
Full Description: Bilendo - your cloud software for more efficiency in Accounts Receivable. Bilendo is an AR automation platform that helps companies ensure scalable processes in accounts receivable, reduce costs, reduce DSO and increase liquidity. At Bilendo, we know how important it is to make debtor processes flexible and efficient. Because of their complexity, these processes require an enormous amount of resources: they are time-consuming and cost-intensive. By displaying and communicating all processes through a central point, companies avoid problems with internal coordination and processing. With workflow-based automation, processes run naturally and continuously, depending on the desired configuration - completely independent of the existing infrastructure. Our customers include hundreds of enterprise companies from a wide variety of industries. Our cloud platform supports these companies in increasing their efficiency by primarily ensuring lower process and capital costs, optimized working capital and reduced payment defaults. In addition, with Bilendo, highly relevant and up to date debtor data is centrally available that companies can use to make effective decisions. Bilendo was founded in 2015 by Markus Haggenmiller, Jakob Beyer and Florian Kappert in Munich. Together with their international team, they have set themselves the goal of relieving companies of complex processes and ensuring scalable growth. Learn more about Bilendo: www.bilendo.de or follow us on LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/bilendo-gmbh Free test now: www.bilendo.de/plattform/testaccount Career at Bilendo: www.bilendo.de/careers Read more about successful credit management with Bilendo: https://www.bilendo.de/library/credit-management

Description: A St. Louis startup developing drugs that target specific molecules in cancerous tumors.
Full Description: Affigen develops tumor-identifying therapies to treat cancer.  By utilizing precision design, we can drive powerful immune responses against molecules unique to cancer, while minimizing the risk of damage to healthy tissues.  To do this, we focus on highly-automated process engineering and personal-scale biologics manufacturing in order to develop new therapies for previously “undruggable” targets.   In effect, we focus on cancer’s “Achille’s Heel”: the proteins which distinguish tumor cells from normal cells, which can target tumor cells for destruction with extreme sensitivity and precision.   As a translational-stage company, we develop our therapeutics with rapid clinical adoption in mind, and in close collaboration with an extensive expert network of world-class academic collaborators.

Description: Leader in affordable drone detection & tracking technology and creator of SafeSky system.
Full Description: Advanced Protection Systems has developed and offers SafeSky a unique, based on proprietary technologies, drone detection system that allows for a reliable operation night and day under any weather conditions, including clouds, fog and rain with an effective drone detection distance of minimum 500 m. It is perfectly suited to protect: a) critical infrastructure installations (airports, power plants, ports, etc.) b) government buildings and installations c) sports facilities  d) VIPs e) borders  f) private property  g) events The system is based on three different sensors: 1. Radar - operating in the unlicensed 10 GHz band is based on in-house developed silicon IC that integrates full RF front end functionality in one single chip of 3x3 mm size. It is miniaturized, low power and affordable while delivering superior drone detection capabilities. Advanced signal processing algorithms minimize false alarm rates and enable to differentiate drones from birds. 2. Acoustic - a specially designed microphone array performs beam forming detecting sound sources in different directions. Machine learning and classification algorithms provide for fault proof operation under surrounding noise conditions. The sensor differentiates between different sound sources pointing to drones only. 3. Vision cameras - a set of cameras allows visualization of drones and recording incident footage for post-incident actions. The system comes with a friendly to use software that provides for drones monitoring, incidents archiving, sms, email and system alerts. The system is easily scalable allowing cost-efficient implementation for both large and small areas/installations. Description: Perlara, PBC is precision drug discovery that leaves no mutation behind.
Full Description: Perlara, PBC is the first Public Benefit Corporation accelerating precision drug discovery for 5,000+ rare genetic diseases. PLab uses a platform of CRISPR-engineered animal models (yeast, nematodes, fruit flies and zebrafish) in whole-organism phenotypic screens to generate disease-reversing orphan drug candidates much faster and cheaper than traditional in vitro and cell-based approaches. Their lead discovery programs are Niemann-Pick Type C, a lysosomal storage disorder first described nearly a century ago, and NGLY1 Deficiency, a congenital disorder of glycosylation first diagnosed last year. Their initial pipeline includes, among others, additional lysosomal storage disorders, e.gs, Batten and Mucolipidosis IV, mitochondrial diseases, e.g., Leigh, and peroxisomal biogenesis disorders, e.g., Zellweger.

Consequently, immune system dysfunction is a critical, often causative, factor in brain dysfunction. MindImmune scientists are at the forefront in recognizing the therapeutic opportunities in targeting the immune system to treat brain disease. Industries: Blockchain, Information Technology, Intellectual Property, Internet, Software
Description: The world's first truly composable IP ownership, utility & cross-chain authentication protocol
Full Description: The world's first truly composable IP ownership, utility & cross-chain authentication protocol. InvArch revolutionizes the world of innovation beginning at the very start of development.  InvArch features the INV4 Standard for minting authenticated & interoperable files or NFTs as IP Files (IPFs), truly composable IP Sets, & pegged IP Tokens (IPTs) featuring multi-purpose utility to Web 3.0. Wrapped IP (WIP) are permanent or temporary extensions of an IPF or IP Set whose content mirrors that of its parent, feature custom streamlined agreements (terms, limitations, conditions, and expirations), & can be used cross-chain by separate owners & IP Sets than their parents.  InvArch also introduces the Cross-Chain Authentication (XCA) Protocol, featuring Cross-Consensus Messaging (XCM) to index, cross-reference, & certify INV4 Standard IP asset authenticity across Web3. Future upgrades are planned to be explored in order to advance the Cross-Chain Authentication (XCA v.1) to Cross-Consensus Authentication (XCA v.2), and fully realize a web3 comprehensive standard for IP asset authentication & protection.
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Information Technology, Internet Services, Other, Professional Services, Software
Top 5 Investors: Web3 Foundation, Gate Labs, Gate Labs, Bitrise Capital, TsingTech Ventures

Industries: Apps, Consulting, Fertility, Health Care, Men's, Personal Finance, Subscription Service, Wellness, Women's
Description: She’s Well provides subscription plans to help women and couples to preserve their fertility and have children when they’re ready.
Full Description: She’s Well brings a Netflix-like subscription model to fertility, to help women, men, and couples to have children when they’re ready. The company works with its network of top-tier fertility centers to provide financing plans for fertility testing, IVF, egg freezing and sperm freezing. With an on-demand concierge care approach, She’s Well provides support and guidance, to make the fertility journey less confusing and isolating. 1 in 6 couples has trouble conceiving and we’re waiting longer to try. Women increasingly delay childbirth - one in three women in the U.S. has her first child after 30 and one in ten after 35. Male sperm count has decreased over 50 percent in the last decade. Despite all the solutions available on the market, infertility services remain available to only 1%. Health plans usually don't cover infertility treatments. The typical costs range from 12,000 to 20,000 dollars for IVF, plus another few thousand for the genetic testing involved to ensure the fetus is chromosomally normal. To help, She’s well started out offering subscription plans and concierge guidance to make fertility care more affordable and accessible to the 99%. We need to usher a world where decisions about family and career aren't ruled by biological clocks and where the best options, science, and care are available to everyone who wants to start a family.
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Apps, Community and Lifestyle, Financial Services, Health Care, Other, Professional Services, Software

Description: The Blockchain Solution that fast-track the mass adoption of Blockchain Technology.
Full Description: Forward Protocol uses an easy-to-use WordPress-like model to facilitate a no-code environment that users can use to deploy their dApps, subnets, and blockchains without technical knowledge. Forward Protocol provides blockchain toolkits that connect the value-driven economy.  5 core smart contracts will be available in Forward Protocol: ➤ Proof of Value-Delivered (PoVD) ➤ Proof of Value (PoV) ➤ Distributed Reward and Revenue Sharing (DRRS) ➤ Proof of Ownership (PoO) ➤ Initial Value Offering (IVO) The adoption of blockchain into companies' architecture has the potential to dramatically reshape the capital markets industry, with a significant impact on the way businesses model themselves, manage risks, save cost and capital. However, the revolution will not happen overnight due to the high barrier to entry into this sector. Forward Protocol solves these challenges by: ➤ Lowering the barrier to entry across verticals through a B2B approach that connects ideas, companies, and markets with open source, fully customizable, no-code blockchain smart contract tools within Forward Factory to make blockchain adoption seamless. The instant deployment model - Forward Factory:  ➤ Makes blockchain adoption an unambiguous and straightforward process for organizations.  ➤ Decide. Deploy. Test. Evaluate. No hidden cost involved. ➤  Has a no-code, drag and drop interface.  ➤  Any platform can install its open-source application integrated with the smart contracts of choice (fully customizable), pre-integrated with Forward Protocol and $FORWARD.  ➤ Platforms that deploy contracts through Forward Factory can set the fees (revenue model) for users on their platform, turn features on/off, modify terms/policies, and easily integrate these modifications with their business model. The process is designed to help platforms deploy and become blockchain-ready with a much shorter lead time than it would take to develop a platform themselves. Detailed information about the project, its architecture, and ecosystem can be found at Whitepaper.ForwardProtocol.io
Industry Groups: Blockchain and Cryptocurrency, Education, Information Technology, Other, Software

Description: Reinvent the way we move by connecting a multi-mode mobility alliance and uniting its eVehicles with power grids for carbon-zero mobility
Full Description: bloXmove is reinventing the way we move through decentralization in the transit backbone, not aggregation with the next 'super app'.  We provide a distributed ledger infrastructure to connect a seamless global Mobility Alliance: from scooter, bikes, taxis and car sharer to trains and busses. Furthermore, we connect their electric vehicles with the power grids in order to balance renewable energies. bloXmove - the Mobility Blockchain Platform is a B2B ledger designed and built to provide a common infrastructure around which mobility services can be automatically orchestrated, bundled and financially settled. Our mission is to establish a connected mobility ecosystem that empowers users to seamlessly access transit services around the world: your favorite app, one journey from A to B, our decentralized network as the backbone. With an emphasis on openness and collaboration, bloXmove utilizes distributed ledger technologies to provide trust and consensus between the operational business actors connected in their global mobility alliance.  WE STOP AGGREGATION, AND START COLLABORATION. Your bloXmove benefits as transport operator or mobility provider:  (1) REDUCED INTEGRATION COSTS: A single plug-in, access to many network partners: through standardized, open-source protocols and APIs (2) EVERY PARTY CAN KEEP ITS CUSTOMER TOUCHPOINT: Secure portability of user profiles and data preserving confidentiality through the concept of decentralized ID will also reduce customer acquisition costs (3) AUTOMATION & HYPER EFFICIENCY: A safe, end-to-end transaction chain incl. customer identification, smart contracting and consumption-based settlement as well as cross-company revenue distribution in real-time   (4) EXTEND YOUR MULTIMODAL OFFERS: every verified party can bundle mobility services and sell tickets in its own app/e-shop in order to offer 'A to B journeys' - Mobility Service Roaming at its best. Your bloXpower benefits as fleet or charging point operator:  (1) DECARBONIZE YOUR MOBILITY BUDGET SOLUTION: Offer flexible mobility for employees with a link to green miles recording and rewarding  (2) BRING YOUR OWN PROVIDER: Offer your clients an open charging network with individual energy providers and CPO (3) CARBON CREDITS: Create certificates of CO2 savings based on energy consumption for Net-Zero Strategy or CO2 offsetting (4) VEHICLE TO X-SERVICES: Use EV’s battery storage to improve self-sufficiency of real estates and balance renewable energies

Description: The easiest way to do mass communication at scale!
Full Description: The way we have approached mass communication for member-based communities has remained unchanged for decades. However, we strongly believe that there is an opportunity to rethink this matter. Yornest offers a fresh approach to how mass communication is handled for member-based communities. Say goodbye to the old-fashioned, one-size-fits-all approach and embrace a new era of streamlined, efficient, and engaging communication. Traditional SMS & email channels for member-based communities is a one-sided conversation that often inundates users with generic messages, leaving them feeling disconnected and bombarded. At Yornest, we believe in a more meaningful approach. Our innovative community communication app empowers community managers to transform SMS & emails marketing into a two-way dialogue. Imagine sending SMS or email alerts that not only convey your message but also drive the recipients to engage in a community feed where they can discuss, ask questions, and share their thoughts in real-time. It's time to bid farewell to one-way SMS & email blasts and embrace a more interactive and engaging communication method that fosters genuine connections. At Yornest, we deeply appreciate that the vitality of any community is intricately linked to the quality of its interactions and conversations. This profound understanding has led us to revolutionize the way community managers harness the potential of SMS and email channels as a means of communication, seamlessly integrating them into a dynamic community feed. Unlike traditional approaches, our community feed transcends being a mere one-way communication tool; it serves as the pulsating epicenter of engagement. Our innovative platform empowers users to leverage posts from the feed as text alerts or emails, effectively transforming every interaction into an opportunity for fostering meaningful dialogue. In doing so, we are dismantling the longstanding barriers that have separated marketing from community engagement.
Industry Groups: Apps, Software

Description: MORPHOGEN-IX Limited is a drug discovery company founded in 2015 by Index Ventures to develop bone morphogenetic proteins
Full Description: MORPHOGEN-IX Limited is a drug discovery company founded in 2015 by Index Ventures to develop bone morphogenetic proteins as a novel therapy for the treatment for pulmonary arterial hypertension Pulmonary arterial hypertension is a severe and life-limiting disease that affects the blood vessels in the lungs, leading to heart failure, and leaves sufferers feeling breathless and exhausted. Current treatments mainly target symptoms and the prognosis remains poor. The only effective cure is transplantation of the lungs or heart and lungs, which has associated risks and complications. Compromised bone morphogenetic protein (BMP) receptor type II (BMPR-II) signalling in endothelial cells plays a pivotal role in the pathobiology PAH, as identified from human genetic studies. BMP9 and 10 represent circulating ligands that selectively bind and activate BMPR-II receptor complexes on endothelial cells. Administration of exogenous BMP9 has been shown to augment endothelial BMPR-II signalling and reverse PAH in several rodent models of disease. Our goal is to explore the potential of BMP9 and BMP10 as potential therapies for PAH. The company follows the semi-virtual model with a hub based in Cambridge, UK. The company founders are experts in the field of PAH and BMPs. The team is staffed with experienced drug discovery professionals to direct an out-sourced development program. This model ensures maximum capital efficiency without sacrificing quality.
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering
Top 5 Investors: Cambridge Innovation Capital, Index Ventures, Medicxi, University of Cambridge Enterprise

Description: NeuVasQ is a pharmaceutical restoration company.
Full Description: NeuVasQ is developing drugs to restore blood-brain barrier function in acute neurological disorders such as stroke and epilepsy, as well as neurodegenerative diseases such as Alzheimer's. It is based on discoveries about the molecular mechanisms that keep the blood-brain barrier intact (BBB). The BBB regulates the exchange of information between the vascular and central nervous systems (CNS). Increased BBB permeability, whether due to age or injury, plays a role in many neurological conditions by allowing harmful blood substances to enter the CNS. Many neurodegenerative disorders, such as Alzheimer's, as well as a variety of acute neurological conditions, such as stroke and epilepsy, are associated with BBB dysfunction.

Full Description: Stringbean is a proven platform used to guide workers and vendors through mission critical tasks. Description: Air quality monitoring solutions
Full Description: Atmotube lets companies and individuals measure and control the air quality in their buildings and outdoor better, cheaper and more reliable than they do it today. Products:  Atmocube is a complete and reliable solution for complex air quality monitoring in private, public, and commercial buildings. It accurately measures the most dangerous air pollutants, such as CO2, NO2, PM1, PM2.5, PM10, CO, VOCs, i.e. formaldehyde, and tracks vital environmental parameters: relative humidity, temperature, atmospheric pressure, noise and light levels in real-time. Atmotube is a line of personal air quality monitors that help people better understand the quality of the air they breathe and keep themselves safe from air pollution. It comes with an air quality coach app that notifies you when the air is polluted and provides personalized recommendations on how to improve indoor air quality. To monitor worldwide air quality changes, there is a global real-time air pollution map. Atmotube PLUS is a wearable, portable device that monitors the quality and safety of the air you breathe. With more precise and reliable sensors, it accurately measures real-time air pollution caused by harmful gases and a wide range of Volatile Organic compounds (VOCs) like acetone, methanol, benzene, ethanol,  xylene, and formaldehyde. It also measures atmospheric pressure, temperature, and humidity.  Atmotube PRO is our most advanced portable solution for air quality tracking. It detects PM1, PM2.5, and PM10 pollutants, such as dust, pollen, soot, and mold spores. It can also measure VOCs concentration, atmospheric pressure, temperature, and humidity - all in real time!
Headquarters Regions: San Francisco Bay Area, West Coast, Western US
Industry Groups: Consumer Electronics, Hardware, Health Care, Real Estate, Science and Engineering, Software, Sustainability

Description: HealthVenture is a global foundry innovation center of excellence and an investment fund.
Full Description: Established in 2016, HealthVenture is a global foundry innovation center of excellence and an investment fund that supports and scales an elite cohort of early and seed-stage digital healthcare entrepreneurs whose goal is to transform digital health. They know that end to end support for academic medical entrepreneurs accelerates the creation of impactful digital solutions. Their competitive niche is solving the first scalability challenge which increases the success of the entrepreneurs and the investment. Technology has the power to impact and penetrate markets that are typically underserved by advancements in medicine and allied health opportunities. They focus on but are not limited to technologies in the areas of behavioral health, wearables, big data and artificial intelligence, patient engagement and core technology such as EMR and blockchain. By leveraging their team's depth of knowledge and strategic partnerships with top institutions and experts around the world, they are uniquely positioned to identify, support and launch innovative digital health solutions on a global scale from ideation to product launch. HealthVenture offers four premier services: HealthVenture Labs, HealthVenture Capital, HealthVenture Advisory and the Tulasi Foundation. HealthVenture Labs is an intensive 120-day incubator program working with startups to develop, build, and launch a minimally viable product to beta-customers. HealthVenture Capital is a venture fund investing in disruptive technologies and solutions with a mission to improve healthcare on a global scale. HealthVenture Advisory works with mid to large healthcare firms seeking to enhance and create innovative environments. The Tulasi Foundation funds and supports underrepresented populations of women and girls, as entrepreneurs, to innovate in their local healthcare markets. Health Venture’s team brings 50 plus years of innovation, execution, healthcare consulting, finance, law, business development and technology experience.

Description: Dozera News Is a American News Company & website this company started by Gursharn Arya in 2018
Full Description: Dozera News: Transforming the American Media Landscape Since 2018 In a rapidly evolving media landscape, Dozera News has emerged as a prominent American news company, delivering unbiased and reliable news to its readers since its inception in 2018. Founded by Gursharn Arya, an entrepreneur with a vision to redefine journalism, Dozera News has quickly gained recognition for its commitment to journalistic integrity and its dedication to providing in-depth and accurate reporting. This article delves into the story behind Dozera News, highlighting its journey, key milestones, and its impact on the American news industry. The Visionary Founder: Gursharn Arya, a Singer, Billionaire and Actor, recognized the need for a news platform that could break free from sensationalism, biases, and misinformation. With this vision in mind, Arya founded Dozera News in 2018. Arya's extensive experience in the media industry, coupled with a strong commitment to truthful reporting, became the driving force behind the company's mission to deliver reliable news to its audience. Unbiased Reporting: Dozera News is distinguished by its unwavering commitment to unbiased reporting. The company takes pride in its ability to provide comprehensive coverage of a wide range of topics, from politics and current affairs to business, technology, and entertainment. The team of talented journalists at Dozera News adheres to a strict code of journalistic ethics, ensuring that each news article is fact-checked, verified, and presented without bias, enabling readers to form their own opinions based on reliable information. In-Depth Analysis and Investigative Journalism: One of the key strengths of Dozera News lies in its commitment to in-depth analysis and investigative journalism. The company goes beyond reporting surface-level news and delves deeper into the underlying factors, exploring the complexities of significant events and issues. Through meticulous research and thorough investigations, Dozera News strives to bring transparency to the forefront and uncover the truth, even in the face of challenges and resistance. Engaging Digital Presence: Understanding the evolving media landscape, Dozera News has established a strong digital presence. Its user-friendly website and mobile applications provide readers with easy access to the latest news updates, feature articles, and exclusive interviews. The company has embraced various digital platforms and social media channels, engaging with its audience and promoting meaningful discussions on critical issues. Recognition and Impact: Since its establishment, Dozera News has received widespread recognition for its contributions to the American news industry. The company's commitment to journalistic integrity has earned it a loyal readership base that values accurate and unbiased reporting. In an era plagued by misinformation, Dozera News has become a trusted source of news, empowering readers to make well-informed decisions and contributing to a more informed society. Future Endeavors: With its solid foundation and growing influence, Dozera News continues to expand its reach and impact. The company aims to diversify its coverage, exploring emerging trends and issues, and reaching new demographics. By leveraging cutting-edge technologies and innovative storytelling techniques, Dozera News seeks to evolve with the changing media landscape, adapting to the needs and preferences of its readers while remaining steadfast in its commitment to truthful and reliable journalism. Conclusion: Dozera News, founded by Gursharn Arya in 2018, has made remarkable strides in the American news industry. Through its unwavering dedication to unbiased reporting, in-depth analysis, and investigative journalism, the company has emerged as a beacon of truth and reliability. As it continues to grow and adapt to the ever-changing media landscape, Dozera News remains steadfast in its mission to deliver accurate, transparent, and impactful news to its readers, playing a vital role in shaping an informed society.

Description: Alivio Therapeutics is pioneering a new way to treat inflammatory diseases based on precisely tuning the immune system.
Full Description: Alivio Therapeutics is pioneering targeted disease immunomodulation as a novel strategy to treat a range of chronic and acute inflammatory disorders. Targeted disease immunomodulation involves tuning the immune system exclusively at the site of disease in the body, with minimal impact on the rest of the immune system. This long sought-after approach has potential to treat a range of chronic and acute inflammatory disorders including ones that would otherwise be difficult to treat. Alivio has exclusive rights to a proprietary inflammation-targeting technology, based on the research of Dr. Karp (BWH/HMS) and Dr. Robert Langer (MIT), which is the first technology to reproducibly show the ability to target immunomodulatory compounds to inflamed tissue, which can lead to dramatic improvements in treatment efficacy with major reductions in systemic effects. The platform has been validated in multiple labs and preclinical models of inflammation, including models where the inflammation occurred in different parts of the body (e.g., the GI system, the bladder, joints, skin, etc.). The technology could potentially be used with a variety of medications (e.g., small molecules, biologics, and nucleic acids) both independently or in combination, and is designed to be administered orally or via other routes. With this platform, Alivio aims to address the dozens of conditions where inflammation is a central part of the underlying disease pathology, but where targeted and effective treatment options are lacking.
Headquarters Regions: Greater Boston Area, East Coast, New England
Industry Groups: Biotechnology, Health Care, Science and Engineering
Top 5 Investors: U.S. Department of Defense

Description: IM Therapeutics develops personalized immuno-therapeutic drugs.

Their goal is to preserve pancreatic beta-cell function and maintain normal insulin production in at-risk and early-stage patients with type 1 diabetes. They are leveraging Their HLA platform to expand their pipeline beyond T1D, to include drug development for Celiac disease (gluten sensitivity) as well as potential additional autoimmune diseases. Industries: Health Care, Health Insurance, Hospital, Pharmaceutical
Description: Renew Health’s mission is to fundamentally transform how medications are managed in the health care system.
Full Description: Medications account for about 20% of total health care spending, are the most frequent clinical intervention delivered by doctors to patients, and are the most frequent interaction patients experience with their health plans. Medications (particularly specialty) are also the fastest growing spend category for health plans.   Health plans rely on pharmaceutical benefits managers (PBMs) to develop formularies and negotiate prices. We believe PBMs have misaligned incentives with health plans and patients.  Traditional PBMs tend to make more money when medications are more expensive and when patients take more of them.    Renew Health’s business model is designed to align with health plans and patients. We envision charging fixed fees on a per-member and per-task basis to administer medications while passing through drug related costs and rebates to health plans. Renew Health would also be compensated for delivering clinical services designed to improve outcomes and lower the total cost of care for health plans, thereby aligning Renew Health’s revenue with value for payers and patients.

Optima is leading the market with its ultra-fast fault-simulation technology, capable of performing fault-simulations over 5 orders of magnitude faster than regular RTL and GL simulation tools, for various Functional Safety application. Specifically, (1) Optima-SE: Selective hardening solution for resolving soft-errors (transient-faults) and achieving ASIL-B, ASIL-C or ASIL-D with minimal engineering and silicon costs. (2) Optima-HE: Hard-error (Permanent-faults) coverage measurement and boosting tool, designed for ISO-26262 compliance and development of STLs (Software Test Library).

Industries: Artificial Intelligence, Biotechnology, Information Technology, Life Science, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, Pharmaceutical, Software
Description: AI-enabled software for preclinical experiment development
Full Description: New drugs fail in human clinical trials 90% of the time. These failures can be traced directly back to the consistent inability of preclinical animal studies to predict clinical success. Yet the design process for preclinical animal studies has remained largely unchanged for decades; scientists read a tiny fraction of published literature and write their experimental protocols in 2-4 weeks. This time-consuming, tedious process is not only a major pain point for in-vivo scientists but leads to substantial experimental design flaws, resulting in unreliable data with which billion-dollar decisions are made. Scientists we’ve spoken to repeatedly express their struggle with the overwhelming amount of preclinical information they need to sift through in order to design experiments. At ModernVivo, we are revolutionizing this antiquated process by equipping scientists with tools that enable them to write in-vivo protocols more effectively. Our technology empowers scientists to streamline their work, accelerating drug development timelines.
Industry Groups: Artificial Intelligence, Biotechnology, Data and Analytics, Health Care, Information Technology, Science and Engineering, Software
Top 5 Investors: University of Michigan, Washington Technology Industry Association (WTIA), Desai Accelerator

Description: qChange uses its SaaS solution to capture real-time leadership signals at scale using collaboration tools.
Full Description: qChange developed a leadership grade that is portable, peer verified, and immutable for the lifetime of the leader. Currently, there is no easy method to grow and promote a leader’s soft skills throughout the lifetime of their career leaving HR and their partners in the dark on the impact of their development initiatives. qChange's Leadership Experience is a SaaS solution that is embedded inside Microsoft Teams. CURRENT PRODUCT The Behavior360® Platform is the only continuous, real-time solution that strengthens manager & team relationships, increases employee engagement, and provides HR with real-time signals of program impact. The qChange Leader Experience solution includes over 45 behavioral areas, 900 unique nudges & 800 nano-learnings. It also includes an industry-first, real-time leader score. This results in a real-time portable leader score on the blockchain. TARGET MARKET qChange's initial SOM is 3,000 US companies with >500 employees in knowledge worker industries. We are focused on partner channels (e.g., coaching companies, leadership development) for the initial beachhead. The initial market is 1M mgr./users for a SOM of $389M. Target companies desire real-time signals on program impact, an inclusive & feedback-driven culture and in-the-flow leadership development that maximizes their content. BUSINESS MODEL Leader Experience is an 80% margin business, SaaS-based business utilizing: 1) a partner channel with Coaching and leadership development companies that already sell to large organizations. $350/leader/yr. ASP. 2) a direct B2B channel, selling individual and corporate licenses for $500/leader/yr. to companies w/500-2,000 employees. Added services include custom leadership frameworks and company culture program implementation. COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGE There are three distinct competitive advantages for qChange. 1) Patents pending Leader Experience cycle, that includes real-time prompts, feedback, and measurement of leader growth. 2) First-mover advantage by focusing on soft skills in meetings, integrated with Microsoft Teams. 3) The Behavior360® Platform measures the real-time impact of leadership initiatives. 4) Industry-first portable leader score.
